sqlMap.statement:
SELECT EAIBZWKDSTCD AS "EAIBZWKDSTCD" , TRANCODE AS "TRANCODE" , STARTBIT AS "STARTBIT" , SYSMODE AS "SYSMODE" , SYSTYPE AS "SYSTYPE" , SYSSEND AS "SYSSEND" , SYSRECV AS "SYSRECV" , UBMUGIGN AS "UBMUGIGN" , UBMUSEQ AS "UBMUSEQ" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHL01
EAIBZWKDSTCD = #eaiBizCode#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIHL01 ( EAIBZWKDSTCD , TRANCODE , STARTBIT , SYSMODE , SYSTYPE , SYSSEND , SYSRECV , UBMUGIGN , UBMUSEQ ) VALUES ( #eaiBizCode# , #tranCode# , #startBit# , #sysMode# , #sysType# , #sysSend# , #sysRecv# , #ubmugign# , #ubmuSeq# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIHL01 SET TRANCODE = #tranCode# , STARTBIT = #startBit# , SYSMODE = #sysMode# , SYSTYPE = #sysType# , SYSSEND = #sysSend# , SYSRECV = #sysRecv# , UBMUGIGN = #ubmugign# , UBMUSEQ = #ubmuSeq# WHERE EAIBZWKDSTCD = #eaiBizCode#
